title: Show count for eggs only, weight for all other products

requirements.text: In ProductCard, display a numeric count (e.g., '6 pcs', '12 pcs') instead of weight for egg products only. All other products must continue to show their weight value with the Scale icon. Egg products should be identified by checking if the product's category or name contains 'egg' (case-insensitive).
acceptanceCriteria: Egg products (matched by name or category containing 'egg', case-insensitive) display a numeric count (e.g., '6 pcs') instead of weight.
All non-egg products continue to display weight with the Scale icon as before.
The count label uses a suitable icon or label to distinguish it from the weight display.
The change is reflected consistently in ProductCard wherever it is rendered (QuickAddEssentials, FlashDeals, ProductCatalog, etc.).

constraints: Do not change the weight display logic for any non-egg products.
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ (immutable paths).
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui/ (immutable paths).
nonGoals: Adding a new backend field or data model for egg count.
Changing cart quantity logic or checkout flow.
Modifying weight display for any product other than eggs.
